metadata.title: CVE-2022-2047 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Eclipse Jetty versions 9.4.0 thru 9.4.46, and 10.0.0 thru 10.0.9, and11.0.0 thru 11.0.9 versions, the parsing of the authority segment of anhttp scheme URI, the Jetty HttpURI class improperly detects an invalidinput as a hostname. This can lead to failures in a Proxy scenario.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jetty9 - 9.4.48-1
libjetty9-extra-java - 9.4.48-1
libjetty9-java - 9.4.48-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.4.48-1').
